transcript: But it was rejected too just like the others
By this time my patience was exhausted because I was in a hurry to start taking my engine apart
The sheep you asked for is inside
There will surely be enough grass for him I said
And that is how I made the acquaintance of the little prince
The little prince who asked me so many questions never seemed to hear the ones I asked him
I made a great effort therefore to find out more on this subject
But the little prince seemed shocked by this offer Tie him What a queer idea But if you dont tie him I said he will wander off somewhere and get lost
